title: Romance Beyond Romance
overview: The debt-ridden actor Gu Zhenzhen and the technology upstart Lu Yunchen have completed their contractual marriage and are ready to embrace a new life. Lu Yunchen unexpectedly lost his memory, only remembering her as his "wife"! Helpless, Gu Zhenzhen can only continue the contract marriage while helping Lu Yunchen regain his memory, but slowly discovers the truth of the contract marriage and finds true love.
